categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Pradoc was a male Human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War.
During the Cold War, he sold specialized gear for Jedi Consulars in the Combat Training section of Carrick Station.
Pradoc first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a level 50 Battlemaster PVP Gear vendor.
